H0.text: The bumblebee or hog-nosed is the smallest mammal in the world - what is it. Mouse

H1.text: The bumblebee or hog-nosed is the smallest mammal in the world - what is it. Shrew

H2.text: The bumblebee or hog-nosed is the smallest mammal in the world - what is it. Hedgehog

H3.text: The bumblebee or hog-nosed is the smallest mammal in the world - what is it. Bat

A4.text: The Etruscan shrew (Suncus etruscus) is the smallest known living terrestrial mammal, measuring about 3.5 cm in length and weighing 1.8 grams.
